episodes.title: Evil Under the Sun
episodes.plot: Poirot's rehabilitative health retreat on an island resort becomes an even more stimulating mental exercise when a flirtatious film star is found strangled on a nearby beach.

episodes.title: Murder in Mesopotamia
episodes.plot: While Poirot is on holiday in Iraq, the wife of the head scientist at an archaeological dig confides to him that she is the target of threatening letters.
